subject: Re: [junit] How to assert a given string is UTF-8 encoded?
msgSnippet: ... Here s my attempt public boolean isUTF8(String s) { return true; } But seriously, do you mean you have a bunch of bytes and want to know if it s utf-8?
messageBody:
Quoting Ritesh <rut21@...>:

> I have a requirement where I need to be able to assert that any given
> String object (in Java ofcourse) is UTF8 or not. Meaning all the
> characters in the string are actually UTF-8 characters.

Here's my attempt

public boolean isUTF8(String s) {
return true;
}

But seriously, do you mean you have a bunch of bytes and want to know if it's
utf-8?
